This is the WeData blog, dedicated to sharing knowledge about Computer Science and Data Science.

On this blog, you'll find both educational content and information for your long road to code.

We also have a [YouTube channel](https://www.youtube.com/@wedata_unige "WeData") where we post content.

For more information about us, please visit our [Homepage](https://wedata.ch/).
